title: Computer-aided nanodrug discovery: recent progress and future prospects
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00575E, Review Article
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Jia-Jia Zheng, Qiao-Zhi Li, Zhenzhen Wang, Xiaoli Wang, Yuliang Zhao, Xingfa Gao
This review presents an overview of the interactions between nanodrugs and biological entities, as well as computational advances in understanding how these interactions affect nanodrug efficacy, using either traditional or machine learning methods.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
